Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000097 affecting package sharutils for versions less than 4.15.2-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-1000097 affecting package sharutils for versions less than 4.15.2-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sharutils is earlier than 4.15.2-21, affected by CVE-2018-1000097
